title: Rising Edge Oscilloscope Capture
summary: Oscilloscope screenshot showing a trigger pulse, a rising edge step response, and a zoomed rising-edge noise region.

structured_data.description: Scope plot annotated with 2 V/div for the coarse rising edge and 100 uV/div for the zoomed segment, timebase 5 us/div, and transition noted from code 000h to FFFh.
